docs.snippet: Garcia Patto International of Mexico City and, more recently of Guatemala, has opened an office in Trump Tower. According to Juan Jaramillo, recently hired general secretary, the agency is setting itself up as specialists in advertising to the His...
docs.lead_paragraph: Garcia Patto International of Mexico City and, more recently of Guatemala, has opened an office in Trump Tower. According to Juan Jaramillo, recently hired general secretary, the agency is setting itself up as specialists in advertising to the Hispanic market. The agency is 15 years old.

docs.snippet: Donald J. Trump said today that he had completed the first step of his refinancing of Trump's Castle Associates, a prelude to taking full control of the company on Thursday.   Once complete, the restructuring will reduce the company's debt to abou...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump said today that he had completed the first step of his refinancing of Trump's Castle Associates, a prelude to taking full control of the company on Thursday. Once complete, the restructuring will reduce the company's debt to about $357 million from $381 million. The plan follows its bankruptcy reorganization in May 1992.

docs.abstract: Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton's laborious preparations for first presidential debate contrast sharply with Donald J Trump's more carefree approach; hopes to goad her Republican rival, who prefers spontaneity and shuns mock debates, into lashing out.

docs.snippet: LEAD: Construction has begun on what will be the tallest building on the upper East Side, to the delight of its developer, Donald Trump, and the dismay of community groups that tried but failed to cut the planned height of the 55-story structure. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Construction has begun on what will be the tallest building on the upper East Side, to the delight of its developer, Donald Trump, and the dismay of community groups that tried but failed to cut the planned height of the 55-story structure. At 623 feet, Trump Palace, which is going up on a full blockfront of Third Avenue between 68th and 69th Streets, will be 72 feet taller than the area's present tallest building, the 54-story Galleria condominium at 117 East 57th

headline.main: POSTINGS: Trump Palace Going Up; 55 Stories On Third

docs.snippet: Of roughly 60 ventures started or promoted by Mr. Trump, a third did not work out, a third had some success and some problems, and a third met expectations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of roughly 60 ventures started or promoted by Mr. Trump, a third did not work out, a third had some success and some problems, and a third met expectations.
docs.abstract: Analysis by The New York Times examines dozens of business ventures started or promoted by Donald J Trump over past decade, one third of which never got off ground; charts and photos track ideas, deals, business strategies and eventual outcomes for roughly 60 of Republican presidential nominee's most talked-up endeavors.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Ventures Began With a Lot of Hype. Here’s How They Turned Out.
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Projects: Comparing Hype With Results
